   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Ananke: A module for causal inference
*************************************

How to install
==============
1. Install python3
2. Install ananke::

   >>> sudo pip3 -e install ananke/
3. Test installation by running::

   >>> import ananke


Documentation
*************
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   notebooks/causal_graphs.ipynb
   ananke.graphs.rst
   ananke.identification.rst
